extension.background.command.info.title: Background - Info
extension.background.useFront.descriptio: If use front image,which means image is placed on the top of your code.
extension.background.useDefault.deprecat: It will be removed in the next version, please delete this configuration item
extension.background.interval.descriptio: Seconds of interval for carousel, default `0` to disabled
extension.background.fullscreen.descript: Feature - fullscreen, may overwrite other config
extension.background.urlProtocol.error: The image url must use https or file protocol
extension.background.useThemeMode.descri: Would you like to use the light/dark mode of the theme? This will allow different image lists to be used in each mode.
